definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Environmental factors greatly influenced their life habits.
sentences.chinese: 環境因素對竹雞生活習性的影響較大。

sentences.english: However, the inter-specific competition is affected by many factors under natural conditions.
sentences.chinese: 但自然狀況下物種間的競爭受多種環境因素的影響。

sentences.english: Can effectively prevent the objective environmental factors, triggered by excessive repletion .
sentences.chinese: 可有效防止因客觀環境因素引發的過量飽食。

sentences.english: Fluvial systems are extremely susceptible to a range of environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 河流系統長短常容易受到一系列的環境因素。

sentences.english: This difference may stem from improved nutrition or other environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 這種差異可能來自於營養的改善或其他環境因素。

sentences.english: The replicative lifespan of Saccharomyces cerevisiae is determined by both genetic and environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 在複製的釀酒酵母的壽命是由遺傳和環境因素。

sentences.english: Conclution The congenital malformation have direct relation with the heredity and the environment in the pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 結論先天畸形與遺傳和孕早期的環境因素有直接關係。

sentences.english: So there are general susceptibilities but a number of environmental triggers.
sentences.chinese: 易感人羣普遍存在，大量環境因素會引發近視。

sentences.english: Autism is an environmental illness -- at least in some cases.
sentences.chinese: 在有些案例中，自閉症是由於環境因素導致的。

sentences.english: Some people are genetically predisposed, while others lean toward depression because of environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 一些人有遺傳原因傾向，有些是因爲環境因素造成的。

sentences.english: Affiliation describes if the event was of friendly or enemy nature.
sentences.chinese: 盟軍一欄會描述這個事件是否有友軍和環境因素。

sentences.english: This section addresses important environmental factors that may affect the accuracy of low level measurements.
sentences.chinese: 本節闡述可能影響低電平測量準確度的重要環境因素。

sentences.english: Find out why some people haveallergies to certain foods or factors in the environment.
sentences.chinese: 探悉爲什麼一些人會對某些食物和環境因素過敏。

sentences.english: Introduction UVR is one of important factors for cataract.
sentences.chinese: 前言紫外線是引起白內障的重要環境因素之一。

sentences.english: We will investigate the causes and effectsfrom disadvantaged backgrounds to environmental factors.
sentences.chinese: 我們將調研從經濟背景到環境因素，這些問題的起因。

sentences.english: The urban environment is an important factor in the research of lung cancer etiology.
sentences.chinese: 城市環境因素是肺癌病因學研究中的重要內容。

definition: bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4
